channel.title: M/g on LS | Papermod
channel.description: Recent content in M/g on LS | Papermod

item.title: The Woods, Part 1
item.description: Several days ago, I was sitting on my back deck enjoying the summer night air, when I heard a screen door open and close. I peeked over the railing and saw Ashley, my neighbor's 11 year old daughter. She held a battery lantern in one hand and her golden retriever in the other by a leash. I also noticed she had a backpack on. I looked at my watch and thought it was very odd for her to be out at 1am.

item.title: Darla's Big Break, Part 1B
item.description: Having convinced her 15 year old brother to be her tutor, 8 year old Darla turns out to be a quick study, but their activities get more than their bodies going, and soon, almost without noticing, they are in the middle of a torrid love affair.

item.title: Darla's Big Break, Part 1A
item.description: When little eight year old Darla meets a grown man called Jerry at the theater she doesn't know he's just struck out on his own to produce child porn independently, or that he's looking for a girl just like her to be his star. And although he suspects it on first sight, Jerry can't yet know exactly how perfect She is or how much her brother has done to prepare her.

item.title: The Incident At Cherry Lake, Part 5
item.description: After a tense confrontation with Jackie, Derick decides to do what he thought he'd been trying to avoid. Fuck her youngest daughter, little 12 year old Jessica, and this causes Jackie to relive some childhood memories.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 6
item.description: In this, the final chapter, Ashley's father receives some disturbing news, and fearing his time with her might be growing short he decides that it's time to deflower his baby girl, and have full on sexual intercourse.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 5
item.description: Having recovered from his little break down, with the help of his loving daughter, our narrator continues his sexual relationship with here, but a new danger arises, threatening to tear their love affair in twain.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 4
item.description: After some hot sex play with his daughter our narrator is finally overcome by guilt, suffering an emotional break down, and we learn about his 'family tradition'.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 3
item.description: After being unable to resist sexually molesting his daughter for a second time, our narrator gives in to his desires, and starts teaching young Ashley everything.

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 2
item.description: Having once sexually molested his eight year old daughter a horrified father tries to put the breaks on things before they get out of hand. Will he succeed?

item.title: Popping Ashley's Little Cherry, Part 1
item.description: Much to his horror, a man finds himself sexually molesting his young daughter.
